name: CyberPower ST425 Standby UPS Battery Backup and Surge Protector, 425VA/260W, 8 Outlets, Compact, UL Certified
short_description: 425VA/260W Standby Battery Backup Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) System uses simulated sine wave output to safeguard home office and entertainment needs, including computers, gaming consoles, and broadband routers
8 NEMA 5-15R OUTLETS: Four battery backup & surge protected outlets; Four surge protected outlets; INPUT: NEMA 5-15P plug with five foot power cord
ADDITIONAL FEATURES: LED status light indicates Power-On and Wiring Fault, transformer-spaced outlets
GREENPOWER UPS HIGH EFFICIENCY DESIGN: Reduces power consumption by utilizing a compact charger and power inverter to create an ultra-efficient backup power system for home and office use
3-YEAR WARRANTY – INCLUDING THE BATTERY; $75,000 Connected Equipment Guarantee
product_description: The CyberPower ST425 Uninterruptible power supply (UPS) system provides battery backup and surge protection for lightning-induced surges and other power events that can damage electronic equipment. This unit delivers enough battery backup to power connected electronics through utility power failure and enough runtime to perform a graceful shutdown to protect against the loss of data and damage to valuable electronics during longer outages. Including a sleek design, this UPS is perfect for all your home office and entertainment needs, including computers, gaming consoles, and Broadband routers. With a 75K USD lifetime connected equipment guarantee and a three-year warranty, you can trust CyberPower commitment to the quality of this battery backup with surge protection.

product_description: This APC battery back up power supply (Back-UPS Pro model BX1500M) offers guaranteed power and surge protection for wireless networks, computers, and other electronics in your home or business. A backup battery power supply is designed for use during outages and unsafe voltage fluctuations, and provides surge protection with battery backup in the event of damaging power surges and spikes. The APC Back-UPS PRO series of Uninterruptible Power Supply are the perfect battery backup for computer, external harddrive and routers to protect your data and keep you connected. This APC 1500VA UPS offers AVR, is active PFC compatible, and has a User-replaceable battery (APCRBC124, sold separately) to prolong the life of your UPS by APC.

name: CyberPower OL750RM Essential Online UPS System, Double‑Conversion, 750VA/600W, 6 Outlets, Rackmount, Sinewave, LCD Panel, EBM Option, UL Certified
short_description: 750VA/600W ONLINE SINEWAVE UPS: Provides seamless double‑conversion power protection for servers, network equipment, storage devices, and mission‑critical systems.
SIX BATTERY‑BACKUP OUTLETS: Delivers clean, regulated AC power with zero transfer time to prevent shutdowns and protect sensitive electronics.

SELECTABLE OUTPUT VOLTAGE: Supports 100/110/115/120/125V at 50/60 Hz for flexible deployment across IT environments, and compatible with CyberPower Extended Battery Modules for significantly increased runtime during outages.
ADVANCED MANAGEMENT FEATURES: Includes extendable LCD panel, Smart Battery Management, Fast Charge Technology, and optional SNMP/HTTP card (RMCARD205).
UL CERTIFIED & BACKED BY WARRANTY: Includes 3‑year warranty (batteries included) and a Connected Equipment Guarantee.
product_description: The CyberPower OL750RM is a Smart App Online UPS designed for IT professionals who require continuous, clean, and regulated power. Its double‑conversion topology isolates connected equipment from power disturbances, delivering true sine wave output with zero transfer time. The unit supports optional Extended Battery Modules for longer runtime and features Fast Charge Technology to restore backup capacity quickly. An extendable LCD panel provides remote configuration and monitoring, while Smart Battery Management improves battery performance and longevity. With UL certification, generator compatibility, and a robust warranty, the OL750RM is engineered for demanding server rooms, network closets, and enterprise environments.

product_description: A mini-tower UPS with line interactive topology, the CyberPower Intelligent LCD CP1500AVRLCD3 provides battery backup (using simulated sine wave output) and surge protection for desktop computers, workstations, networking devices, and home entertainment systems. The CP1500AVRLCD3 uses Automatic Voltage Regulation (AVR) to correct minor power fluctuations without switching to battery power, which extends battery life. AVR is essential in areas where power fluctuations occur frequently. The CP1500AVRLCD3 comes with a three-year warranty (including coverage of batteries) and a $500,000 Connected Equipment Guarantee.

name: GOLDENMATE 1000VA/600W Lithium UPS Battery Backup and Surge Protector, Backup Battery Power Supply with LiFePO4 Batteries(153.6 Wh), Sinewave UPS System, 10 Years Lifespan, 8-Outlets, LCD Display
short_description: [LiFePO4 Battery, Ultra-long Endurance]: This lithium UPS features a cutting-edge Lithium Iron Phosphate Battery, offering a lifespan of over 10 years and 5000+ charge cycles. It reduces total cost of ownership by over 40% compared to traditional lead-acid batteries, ensuring reliable, long-lasting performance without frequent replacements

[Multi-Outlets & Efficient Cooling System]: This plug-and-play device includes eight NEMA 5-15P outlets with surge protection, an AC power cord, and PP45 terminals for secure connections. The built-in Battery Management System (BMS) ensures safe operation, working efficiently with a low-noise cooling fan (under 50 dB). Note: The fan activates during heavy battery usage

[Trustworthy Protections]: The 1000VA/600W Pure Sine Wave UPS ensures high efficiency by continuously monitoring battery voltage. It protects against power outages, voltage fluctuations, surges, and more, making it ideal for computers, workstations, network devices, and telecom equipment

[Intelligent LCD Panel]: This UPS offers real-time monitoring of battery and power conditions for optimal performance. Its automatic safety mechanism stops charging and discharging if limits are exceeded, preventing damage, avoiding overloads, and extending the UPS's lifespan

[Professional UPS with Certifications]: Our UPS battery backup has successfully passed rigorous safety certifications, ensuring compliance with the highest industry standards. It uses advanced chip technology for double anomaly protection, ensuring safety and reliability. The system offers maintenance-free operation for up to 10 years, ensuring long-term dependability

[Updated Model with Buzzer Mute Function]: When the mains power is abnormal and the product switches to battery mode, a buzzer alarm will sound (check the indicator instructions in manual for the alarm frequency). Press the switch button to turn off the buzzer alarm function. Note: The switch button located below the LCD panel is intergrated with multi-functions. Long press switch 3s for system power on; Long press switch 5s for system power off; Single touch the switch for buzzer mute

[Safety Notice]: Use only the original or fully compatible power cable. Do not use in high-temperature, enclosed, or humid environments. Discontinue use immediately and contact us if any abnormality occurs (e.g. swelling or unusual noise). A matching safety warning label will be clearly displayed on the outer packaging
